title: Show 70 - MATT ZARB-COUSIN
itunes:title: Show 70 - MATT ZARB-COUSIN
itunes:subtitle: Matt Zarb-Cousin was Jeremy Corbyn's spokesman an…
description:
Matt Zarb-Cousin was Jeremy Corbyn's spokesman and gives us a fascinating insight into working for him. He's still a strong advocate, not just for Corbyn as a person and politician, but for Corbyn's ideas. In this intriguing chat, Matt explains why Labour had to change and why he believes the party must become more democratic. He also talks frankly about his gambling addiction and his role in getting the government to limit maximum stakes on Fixed Odds Betting Terminals to £2. Oh and the two Matt's ponder a suggestion to make social media a bit friendlier... You can follow Matt Zarb-Cousin here: @mattzarb You can read about Matt's work for the Campaign For Fairer Gambling here: http://fairergambling.org/about-the-campaign/ You can follow Matt Forde here: @mattforde You can buy tickets to Matt Forde's tour and his new Edinburgh show 'Brexit Through The Gift Shop' here: www.mattforde.com/live

Hosted on Acast. See acast.com/privacy for more information.
